request.description:
https://data.developer.nhs.uk/dms/mim/4.2.00/Index.htm

HL7 standard address use types supported by NPfIT:

"H" - Home address
"HP" - Primary home
"TMP" -Temporary address
“PST” - Correspondence address
“WP” - Work address

Low Priority as in the Compliance spec we have the following requirement 5.2.12 The System must not automatically synchronise PDS telecom numbers, including all ‘use’ attributes, as these are prone to synchronisation failures that then prevent the subsequent use of national services like the EPS until manually resolved.

request.description:
HL7 standard name types supported by NPfIT:

"L" - Usual (current) name
"A" - Alias name
 

NPfIT additions to the set of HL7 standard name types (NPfIT will be pursuing getting these [or suitable equivalents] added into the HL7 standard):

"PREFERRED" - Preferred name
"PREVIOUS-BIRTH" - Birth name
"PREVIOUS-BACHELOR" - Bachelor name
"PREVIOUS-MAIDEN" - Maiden name
"PREVIOUS" - Other previous name

Low Priority as in the Compliance spec we have the following requirement 5.2.12 The System must not automatically synchronise PDS telecom numbers, including all ‘use’ attributes, as these are prone to synchronisation failures that then prevent the subsequent use of national services like the EPS until manually resolved.
